info.title: Party Routing Profile
info.description: This service domain maintains a small profile of key indicators for a customer that is referenced during customer interactions to facilitate routing, servicing and product/service fulfillment decisions. This can include status (such as account in arrears), ratings (such as high value customer) and alerts (such possible fraud activity detected)

post.summary: InCR Initiate profile state monitoring for a party
post.description: InCR Initiate profile state monitoring for a party
